column3: 2 medium eggs, 1 slice of bread, 2 tablespoons shredded cheese, onions
column4:
1. Crack the eggs into a small bowl and beat until evenly combined.
2. Heat a medium-sized frying pan over medium heat.
3. Add the eggs to the pan and cook, stirring continuously until the eggs are scrambled and cooked through.
4. Toast the bread until golden.
5. Remove the toast from the toaster and top with the cooked egg and shredded cheese.
6. Cook the toast in the pan until the cheese is melted and the egg is heated through.
7. Serve the egg and cheese toast hot.
